isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 9800 - HOOD, GRILLE, AND FENDERS - 5000, 9100, 9200, 9300, AND 9400 - DESCRIPTION - GRILLE AND GRILLE TRIM OR GRILLE SURROUND TRIM

svcproc.title: GRILLE AND GRILLE TRIM OR GRILLE SURROUND TRIM
svcproc.para: Grille and grille trim on the 5000 SFA, 5000 SBA (with fiberglass tilt hood), 9200 and 9400 Models, both before and after July 1996, can be removed without removing the hood. The 9100 Model, after March 1997, does not have grille surround trim.
The 5000 SBA (with butterfly hood, optional after August 1994) and 9300 Models require removing the hood to remove the grille and grille trim.
